attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a law abiding, taxpaying citizen, and I should not feel intimidated when I walk down my own street by groups of 'hoodies' and such, who take it upon themselves to verbally and physically abuse me.  We need to give the police powers to disperse groups of more than two youths (under 21 years of age) who congregate on our country's streets, by any means necessary, and impose strict penalties on the offending youths and their parents.
